MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified broken overhead line equipment and have started repair work. We now expect your supply to be restored by 6:30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:07am on 16th January 2021.
